dialogue.text: Hi! Can I help you find something?
dialogue.zh:
嗨! 可以 我 幫忙 你 找 東西?
こんにちは! できます 私 手伝う あなた 探す something?

dialogue.text: Yes, please. I’m looking for olive oil.
dialogue.zh:
是的, 請. 我’m 在找 olive oil.
はい, お願いします. 私’m 探して for olive oil.

dialogue.text: Sure. Do you want regular or extra virgin?
dialogue.zh:
當然. 你 想要 regular or extra virgin?
もちろん. Do あなた want regular or extra virgin?

Extra virgin, 請.
Extra virgin, お願いします.

dialogue.text: It’s in aisle five, near the pasta.
dialogue.zh:
It’s in 走道 five, near the pasta.
It’s in 通路 five, near the pasta.

走道 five, got it.
通路 five, got it.

dialogue.text: Do you need a small bottle or a large one?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 a 小 bottle or a 大 one?
Do あなた 必要 a スモール bottle or a ラージ one?

A 小 bottle 是 fine.
A スモール bottle 私 fine.

dialogue.text: If you see the sauce section, you’re close.
dialogue.zh:
If 你 see the sauce section, 你’re close.
If あなた see the sauce section, あなた’re close.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Would you like me to point it out on the map?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like me to point it 缺 on the map?
Would あなた like me to point it out on the map?

是的, that would 幫忙.
はい, that would 手伝う.

dialogue.text: Here’s the store map—aisle five is in the middle.
dialogue.zh:
Here’s the 店 map—走道 five 是 in the middle.
Here’s the 店 map—通路 five 私 in the middle.

太好了, 謝謝.
いいですね, ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Do you also need anything else?
dialogue.zh:
你 also 需要 anything else?
Do あなた also 必要 anything else?

Maybe black pepper.
Maybe black pepper.

dialogue.text: Black pepper is in the spice rack by aisle four.
dialogue.zh:
Black pepper 是 in the spice rack by 走道 four.
Black pepper 私 in the spice rack by 通路 four.

Alright.
Alright.

dialogue.text: If you can’t find it, come back to me.
dialogue.zh:
If 你 可以’t 找 it, come back to me.
If あなた できます’t 探す it, come back to me.

我 will.
私 will.

dialogue.text: Do you prefer ground or whole pepper?
dialogue.zh:
你 prefer ground or whole pepper?
Do あなた prefer ground or whole pepper?

Ground pepper.
Ground pepper.

dialogue.text: We have a budget brand and a premium brand.
dialogue.zh:
We 有 a budget brand and a premium brand.
We have a budget brand and a premium brand.

Budget 是 fine.
Budget 私 fine.

dialogue.text: Okay, that should be easy to find.
dialogue.zh:
好的, that should be easy to 找.
わかりました, that should be easy to 探す.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

Enjoy your shopping.
Enjoy your shopping.

謝謝 你!
ありがとう あなた!

有 a 太好了 day.
Have a いいですね day.

你 too.
あなた too.
